text:
Action: Added a HTTP header value containing a function call to a test case
using the HTTP Header Manager.  

Expected: The function to be parsed and the function's return value passed as a
HTTP header value as per documentation on functions.

Received: Function was not parsed.  The string was inserted into the HTTP header
verbatim.

I'm scanning the source to find the spot where these config element values are
parsed and the functions extracted and instantiated.  If someone can point me to
the correct class(es), I'm willing to debug and patch.  Thanks.  Ray

Using nightly build 20040301
creator: Ray.Vermette@pwgsc.gc.ca

text: Bug resolved: problem between seat and monitor.  Sorry for the bother.  Ray
creator: Ray.Vermette@pwgsc.gc.ca
